name: Katabra
description:
Abba the witch has botched one of her magic spells, and now all the furniture is floating...and so is she! The hapless witch floated all the way to the top of her tower and in the process, she dropped her wand. It's up to her trusty familiar, Katabra, to reach the top to deliver her wand, all while avoiding various obstacles!

Made for the 2018 Global Game Jam.

Mouse - Click objects to copy its velocity

Backspace- Restart level.

Esc - Exit app.

I plan to finish this game sometime early 2018.

If you like inde game dev you can watch me dev projects on youtube.

Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/user/MilkoDaily
